1126138441979322373.text: @JoinFundabit, the first crypto-Patreon built on Ethereum, is now on @ProductHunt. We are very proud of how far we’ve come and are looking forward to help shape the future of Web 3.0https://www.producthunt.com/posts/fundabit-co …

1125855129339478016.text: We are forking  @MolochDAO  and we are going to be operating our own DAO  (@meta_cartel) -> focused on accelerating the product success  of the Ethereum application layer https://medium.com/metacartel/forking-moloch-dao-d140a37d6649 …

1123891320618213377.text: "Previously, infrastructure has hindered the progress of experimentation on the application layer. However, the tides are shifting as it is increasingly apparent that many application layer experiments and projects are beginning to thrive and find end-user value."pic.twitter.com/YrBLPM9vp1

1123888468239769601.text: The vision of Ethereum is threatened by the competing force of other L1 blockchains that are aggressively pursuing the discovery of end-user value and mass adoption with dapps. The race is on in finding & creating user value on the application layer.https://medium.com/metacartel/rising-threats-to-ethereums-first-mover-advantage-6138bd6c860 …

1123515171127750656.text: "Today, the Ethereum community spends the majority of its resources on abstract design. This is epic, necessary, and the people leading the way are doing a damn good job, but there is a chicken and an egg to the scalability problem, and a blind spot clearly exists with the UX"pic.twitter.com/Apoqmt9C9k

1073592139777540096.text: Proud that one of Ethereum's most important UX problems has been solved once and for all by our amazing team at TabooKey. EIP 1613 makes dapps accessible to new users by allowing contracts to accept "collect calls". Makes onboarding so much easierhttps://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/blob/master/EIPS/eip-1613.md …
